name: Peachy Christmas Gift Box - $30
description:
A Peachy gift box is designed to delight and entertain the paper lover and is the perfect Christmas gift!

Each Peachy box will contain a highly curated selection of paper goods from New Zealand makers and creators.
This gorgeous box will be filled with paper goods to the value of $30. In this special Christmas gift box, all items will be wrapped in sweet Christmas paper and bows.

What you get will be a surprise! We can guarantee you the highest quality range of paper goods handpicked for paper lovers by the Peachy team.

This will be wrapped up in a box and sent to you or your giftee within 5 days of your order.

You will receive a mix of items including:

-greeting cards
-notebooks
-notepads
-gift tags
-art prints
-pencils
-wall decals

depending on what we pick for your unique Peachy box!

Please note if your box is for a gift please go back to our website and fill out this page first before you purchase your box - http://peachygoodness.com/buy-a-gift-box

A Peachy box is the ideal Christmas present for someone special or someone you are not sure what to get. Let us do the work for you and find you something lovely - each box is different!

We will also include a hand written Christmas card - just let us know what you would like the message to read and we'll sort this too!

Please note! -

***The picture is representative of the types of lovely paper goods you will receive only***
***If you are wanting to place an international order (Australia, Asia, Europe or UK) please message us first for a shipping quote***

name: Peachy Card Love Set
description:
Here at Peachy we are a little mad for cards. We love sending them and we love receiving them. And in honour of that we've put together a box of 5 gorgeous cards from our amazing designers! Card love for all!

This box will contain a mix of different cards from our designers, all wrapped up ready to be opened and enjoyed!

You will receive :

- 5 regular size cards, complete with envelopes
- A varied selection of regular cards, love cards, thanks cards and more

This can be sent to your lovely self or your very special giftee.

Please note if your order is for a gift please go back to our website and fill out this page first before you purchase your set - http://peachygoodness.com/buy-a-gift-box

***If you are wanting to place an international order (Australia, Asia, Europe or UK) please message us first for a shipping quote***

name: Peachy Card Love Annual
description:
Here at Peachy we are a little mad for cards. We love sending them and we love receiving them. And in honour of that we're offering you 2 cards from our amazing designers every month for a year! Card love for all!

Each month you will receive an envelope containing 2 x cards from our designers. We'll send you different cards each month and some seasonal cards too. You'll never be short of a card again!

You will receive :

- 2 regular size cards, complete with envelopes
- A varied selection of regular cards, love cards, thanks cards and more

These will be sent:

- On the 1st of the month each month for 12 consecutive months
- To the address specified

These will be wrapped in an envelope and can be sent to your lovely self or your very special giftee.

Please note if your order is for a gift please go back to our website and fill out this page first before you purchase your set - http://peachygoodness.com/buy-a-gift-box

***If you are wanting to place an international order (Australia, Asia, Europe or UK) please message us first for a shipping quote***

name: Peachy Notebook Love Set
description:
Here at Peachy we love a good notebook. Notebooks provide a lovely salvation for writing lists to scribbling and jotting and everything in between! And in honour of that we've put together a gift pack of 2 gorgeous notebooks from our amazing designers! 

This box will contain 2 different notebooks from our designers, all wrapped up ready to be opened and enjoyed!
